document_data.mainbody:
Malanxers Tongue, also known as the Black Tongue was a periodical chapbook published in the city of Iriaebor of the Western Heartlands.
Malanxers Tongue made a name for itself for publishing rants aimed at government officials, merchants, and public figures of Iriaebor. When an individual graced the pages of Malanxers Tongue, they were referred to as "in the Black," after the chapbooks unofficial name â€“ the Black Tongue.
